name: Pirates of Monkey Island of the Caribbean
name_original: Pirates of Monkey Island of the Caribbean
description:
English :

Enjoy this adaptation of the movie "Pirates of the Caribbean" with "Monkey Island" graphics ! Play as Will Turner, Jack Sparrow and Elizabeth Swann to stop the cursed crew of the Black Pearl !

***

Français :
Adaptation du premier film Pirates des Caraïbes avec les graphismes de Monkey Island ! Incarnez tour à tour Will Turner, Jack Sparrow et Elisabeth Swann pour vaincre l’équipage maudit de Barbossa.
